entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Williams Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 PM PDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Williams Lake Airport 04:00 AM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -9.4°C
Wind: SE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High 8. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023
